title: Shining Staver-of-Skulls
content:
Scyllua Darkhope —fallen paladin and champion of Bane — to see how the tools of good can be turned to evil purpose.

Light Hammer Light Thrown

Shining Staver-of-Skulls is one of the Light Hammer Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Shining Staver-of-Skulls is an enchanted hammer that deals additional Radiant damage.
